00028             function                get_settings_manifest( $ManifestFileName )
00029             {
00030                   try
00031                   {
00032                         if( file_exists( dirname( __FILE__ )."/data/$ManifestFileName" ) )
00033                         {
00034                               $CachedFS = get_package( 'cached_multy_fs' );
00035                               $Manifest = $CachedFS->file_get_contents( dirname( __FILE__ )."/data/$ManifestFileName" , 'exploded' );
00036 
00037                               foreach( $Manifest as $k => $m )
00038                               {
00039                                     $Manifest[ $k ] = explode( '#' , $m );
00040                               }
00041                               return( $Manifest );
00042                         }
00043                         else
00044                         {
00045                               throw( new Exception( "Manifest file $ManifestFileName was not found" ) );
00046                         }
00047                   }
00048                   catch( Exception $e )
00049                   {
00050                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00051                   }
00052             }
00053

00077             {
00078                   try
00079                   {
00080                         $Security = get_package( 'security' );
00081                         $CachedFS = get_package( 'cached_multy_fs' );
00082                         
00083                         if( $Options->get_setting( 'view_setting_form' , false ) )
00084                         {
00085                               
00086                         }
00087                         return( '' );
00088                   }
00089                   catch( Exception $e )
00090                   {
00091                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00092                   }
